title: Parsley and parsnip soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 leek, chopped', '1 stick celery, chopped', '10 to 12 parsnips, peeled and chopped', '1.5L chicken or vegetable stock', '30g parsley', '4 tablespoons Greek yoghurt', '200ml milk, or as needed', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'grated Parmesan cheese to serve (optional)']
